name: docker-convex-boilerplate
description: Self-hosted Convex database boilerplate with Docker

scripts.dev: pnpm run self-hosted:setup && pnpm run deploy-functions
scripts.clean: docker compose down && docker system prune -af --volumes
scripts.docker:reset-images: docker compose down && docker system prune -af --volumes
scripts.self-hosted:setup: pnpm run docker:up && echo 'Waiting for backend to start...' && sleep 10 && pnpm run docker:generate-admin-key
scripts.self-hosted:reset: pnpm run self-hosted:stop && pnpm run docker:reset-full
